vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.15;
son of: Beriah (H1283I);
brother of: Arad (H6166B), Ahio (H0283H), Shashak (H8349), Jeremoth (H3406I), Zebadiah (H2069), Michael (H4317L), Ishpah (H3472) and Joha (H3109)
§ Ader = "flock"
1) a Benjamite, son of Beriah, chief of the inhabitants of Aijalon
1a) also 'Eder'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Beriá; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞得 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "群"
一名便雅憫人, 比利亞的兒子 (代上 8:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚得 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "群"
一名便雅悯人, 比利亚的儿子 (代上 8:15)
